about_me_text: Hello stranger! I am Marc and I enjoy making stuff on the Internet. It all started with some Java and now several years (and projects) later I learn Web technologies and I am creating Projects that run in the Net more about that down below. At the moment I am searching for a job as a Software developer
skills_text: A few Technologies I use can be seen here. The lines between them represent their connection to each other.
contact_text: If you think I fit into your team, you want to develop a cool project together with me, or if you just want to say Hi, contact me.
click_prompt_skills: Click one of the above logos to see more
projects_text: Here you can see some work I did. Enjoy!
